mapper.select: /* 실제 id는 selectCategory1이 적절하다. 다만 메소드는 상품노드까지 조회해야 하기 때문에 그에 적절한 이름으로 정하였다. */ SELECT CONCAT('node-', category1, '-1') id, category1 nodeName, '1' NodeDepth FROM PRODUCT_INFO GROUP BY category1
SELECT CONCAT('node-', category2, '-2') id, category2 nodeName, '2' NodeDepth FROM PRODUCT_INFO WHERE category1 = #{nodeName} GROUP BY category2
SELECT CONCAT('node-', product_name, '-3') id, product_name nodeName, '3' NodeDepth FROM PRODUCT_INFO WHERE category2 = #{nodeName} GROUP BY product_name

SELECT * FROM (
product_name as label
category1 as label
category2 as label
product_name as label
'모든 기간' as label
YEAR(pay_date) as label
concat(YEAR(pa.pay_date), '년 ', CEIL(MONTH(pa.pay_date) / 3), '분기') as label
concat(YEAR(pa.pay_date), '년 ', MONTH(pa.pay_date), '월') as label
pa.pay#{periodFrom}, '~', #{periodTo}) as label
address1 as label
FROM MEMBER me, PAY_INFO pa, PRODUCT_INFO pr WHERE me.email = pa.email AND pa.pay_no = pr.pay_no
AND category1 = #{treeNodeName}
AND category2 = #{treeNodeName}
AND product_name = #{treeNodeName}
AND pa.pay_date > #{periodFrom} AND pa.pay_date < #{periodTo}
AND address1 IN
#{eacharea}
)
/* group by */
product_name
category1
category2
product_name
YEAR(pa.pay_date)
YEAR(pa.pay_date), quater
year, month
AND address1 IN
#{eacharea}
else if period if all
else if year group by year else if quater group by year, quater else if month group by year, month else if period
else if area group by address1
select product_name label from( select product_name, category1, category2, Year(pa.pay_date) _year, month(pa.pay_date) _month, CEIL(MONTH(pa.pay_date) / 3) quater, address1 from MEMBER me, PAY_INFO pa, PRODUCT_INFO pr where me.email = pa.email and pa.pay_no = pr.pay_no) a group by a.product_name
